name: Spin Cycle (saucygames)
description:
Spin your way through 40 different palettes to choose from. Spin Cycle is an endless arcade game where the goal is to stop the spinner inside of the goal. Seeing how many in a row you can get. Spin Cycle keeps track of your averages and total amounts of success and failure, displaying them every time a restart is needed.

PS: Hold down on the screen and let go to stop
